data.description:
When the bug army attacked Cacti Island, the Cacti Army deployed you into battle. Together with your comrade Emilio, you fight many battles in the trenches, cities, and woods of Cacti Island, unraveling the story behind the backstabbing attack of the bug army. While on your adventure, you make new friends, learn new skills, and survive the relentless attacks of the bugs.

This WW2 themed VR story shooter brings your weapon combat skills to a new level while taking you on a marvelous adventure though the Cactus Cowboy World.

changelog.change_log:
Fix: Bug that made the hand menu unusable

Add: Quest 3 support
+higher render res
+more enviroment details
+MSAA increaded to 4x

Hot Fix for game breaking bugs in Chapter 6.

Note: bHaptics support is currently deactivated due to Android version issues.

+ FIX Game breaking bug in CH02 Lev03
+ Updated SDKs versions
+ FIX 90hz support on quest 2
+ Attempt fix bHaptics support
+ Add: Hint about next Cactus Cowboy game coming
Minor fixes: Graphical glitches, startup sequence fix. mp40 mesh fix

QOL Update

Add:
* Sticky Hands option

Fix:
* Gun gabbing fix
* Auto recenter on loading
* Auto recenter on menu
* Auto recenter for intro/outro/credits
* Fix floating objects in Lev 2-2
* Fix floating objects in Lev 2-5

* Graphics Update all levels
* New lighting
* New main menu
* New hand menu
* Recoil improved
* Pause function
* MP40 muzzle flash fix
* NPC talk fix
* Stronger zoom on Sniper scope
* Sniper mission easier
* Left hand fix for two handed weapons

New Stuff!
-Supporters DLC added

You can now support this free game and get a horde mode. Defend the civilians in a small village from the vicious waves of enemies!

Make use of your collected Medal of Cactus from the main story. The more you find the more companions you get in the Horde Mode!



Bugfixes:
-Fix Recoil bug
-Fix critical game crash in Lev 21
-Fix game crash when dogs attack npc
-Some ammo boxes couldn't get picked up
-Fix main menu trigger reload option
-Fix hand menu not displaying the current settings on some occasions

New Stuff!
-Supporters DLC added

You can now support this free game and get a horde mode. Defend the civilians in a small village from the visious waves of enemies!

Make use of your collected Medal of Cactus from the main story. The more you find the more companions you get in the Horde Mode! 



Bugfixes:
-Fix Recoil bug
-Fix critical game crash in Lev 21
-Fix game crash when dogs attack npc
-Some ammo boxes couldn't get picked up
-Fix main menu trigger reload option
-Fix hand menu not displaying the current settings on some occasions

Added: Trigger Reload (Using the trigger button instead of grip, optional)
Minor occlusion fixes.
Minor gameplay fixes.

Fixes: 
Game breaking bug (Thanks John)
Improved: Deathzones better player check

Fixed: 
Occlusion in indoor levels
Easter Egg now working
Improvement:
Various performance fixes
Easier mode now a bit easier
Various:
Code consolidation with PC Version

FinalReleaseHotFix:
Flamethrower Ammobox Gltich fix
Counter death dispite successful ending lev34
Enemy AI Coverspot fixes in Lev10
Misaligned Objects  fixed
Intro, Outro, Lev 13, Lev00a  Occlusion fix
Rework Save/Load Floppy
Jump sound less loud
Lev18 Trucks were visible prior attack
Lev28 more enemies during mission

Day1 Patch:
Better left handed support
Hand Menu fix
Audio Mixing
Minor Balancing fixes
Max Ammo
Flamethrower fix
Final Boss init loading fix
Granade Holsters now visible
Handmenu: Diffculty wasn't set correctly
Master Volume in Main Menu
Handmenu can be operated by trigger button
Some Enemies couldn't be punched
Flamethrower had no bhaptics
Medal of Cactus added
